notes:
Unlike [[Wild Horse]]s, regular horses cannot be tamed. However, [[Rented Horse]]s can be temporarily obtained from [[Appaloosa]] and [[Palomino]].

<noinclude>{{Seealso|Horse (Brown)|Horse (Taupe)}}</noinclude>
name: Horse (Grey)
location: South-east, east and north-east of [[Thais]] {{Mapper Coords|text=here|126.196|126.0|7|2|1|0.50.5}} depending on the [[Horse Station World Change]]; one in the [[Gardens of Night]] ({{Mapper Coords|129.18|126.119|10|4|text=here}}, unreachable); one near [[Roswitha]] in [[Rathleton]].
strategy: Ignore it, or just kill it if they are in your path. For information on the world change, including how to make horses spawn in the wild, see [[Horse Station World Change]].
